attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Dear Sir/Madam,

My word of talk is that i experienced and try to put in words,thinking it would be beneficient whole around the world, I went to see a digital camera the price was 99pounds, when i saw the same thing in different shop it was comparbly less around 79 pounds.

For example if we reduce to 49pounds, what would u think would happen, in my opinion millions will sell,likewise if the prices of everything is reduced?? it will save money and phycologically people will buy .

if the things start selling out retailers need to order more , manufactors will need it tonnes, company will need more labour, you will have to bring foreign labor to do the job.

Hope you can understand what i want to say.Hope this word into person who can hear.

Thank you.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
